metadata.title: WaifuAI Extension - Complete Dialogue Collection - Summarized by Copilot
metadata.description: All quotes, messages, and dialogue from the WaifuAI productivity companion extension

general_quotes: Don't forget to take breaks, nya~! ♪(´▽｀)
You're doing amazing! Keep it up! ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ:*
Your hard work makes me happy! ♡⃛◟( ˊ̱˂˃ˋ̱ )◞⸜₍ ˍ́˱˲ˍ̀ ₎⸝◟( ˊ̱˂˃ˋ̱ )◞♡⃛
I'm cheering you on! Go go go~! \(^o^)/
Time for a little break? Tea time! ☕️ (*´▽`*)
Working hard or hardly working? Ehehe~ (´∀｀)♡

happy: Everything is wonderful when you're here! ♡
Today is the best day ever! (◕‿◕)♡
neutral: Ready for whatever comes our way! ♡
sad: Don't worry, tomorrow will be better... (´；ω；`)
Even sad days can have beautiful moments...
Let's take it one step at a time... ♪

task_complete: One more down! You're on fire! ♡
new_task: I believe you can do it! ♡

work_start: Work mode activated! I believe in you! ✧
Time to be amazing! Focus, focus! (｡◕‿◕｡)♡
work_complete: Fantastic work session! 🍅✨ Time for a break!
You're so focused! Break time deserved! ♪(´▽｀)
Amazing productivity! Rest those brain cells! ♡
break_start: Take a deep breath and relax! ✧
Break time magic! Restore your energy! ♡
break_complete: Break over! Ready to conquer more tasks? 💪
Feeling fresh? Time to focus again! ✧
Break complete! Back to being awesome! ♡
long_break_start: Long break time! You've earned this! 🌟
Long break magic! Take your time! ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ:*
Big break time! You've been amazing! ♡

waifu_interaction_success: Perfect timing! Thanks for noticing me! 💖(◕‿◕)
Yay! You caught my signal! I love you! ♡✧
Amazing! You're always there for me! 💕
Kyaa~! You noticed my heart! So happy! ♡(˃͈ દ ˂͈ ༶ )
waifu_click_no_signal: Ehehe~ That tickles! But only special moments give affection now! ♪
I appreciate the attention, but wait for my signal! 💖
Cute! But save your energy for when I really need you! ♡
Aww~ I love the affection, but timing is everything! ✧

productivity_sites: Kyaa~ You're being so productive! I'm proud of you! ♡
Look at you coding like a pro! (◕‿◕)♡
Such focus! You're amazing when you work hard~
Ehehe~ GitHub again? You're such a dedicated developer!
learning_sites: Ooh~ Learning something new? I love watching you grow! ✧
So studious! You're getting smarter every day~
Stack Overflow again? My little problem solver~
social_media: Taking a social break? That's okay, but don't forget our tasks~
Social media can wait! We have productivity goals! (◡‿◡)
Mmm... maybe just a quick scroll? Then back to work? ♪
I see you there... come back to me when you're ready~
entertainment: Entertainment time? You've earned a break! But not too long~ ♡
Anime is good for inspiration! Just remember our tasks~
Having fun? I'll be here when you're ready to work again!
shopping: Shopping again? My wallet is crying... (╥﹏╥)
Ooh~ What are you buying? Anything for me? ♡
Retail therapy? I understand, but our tasks are waiting~
Amazon cart full again? You're so bad~ (◡‿◡)
unknown_sites: Exploring the web? I'm curious what you're looking at~
New site? Stay safe out there! ♡
Wandering the internet? I'll keep you company~

motivational_quotes: Hey~ I know that site is fun, but our tasks are waiting! (◕‿◕)
I believe in your focus! Come back to our tasks when you're ready~
Social media will always be there, but this productive moment won't! ✧
Ehehe~ I see you getting distracted. Need a gentle reminder? ♪
That's enough scrolling for now, don't you think? (｡◕‿◕｡)
I'm not jealous of that website... much~ Come back to me? ♡
encouragement_quotes: You're in the zone! I love watching you work so focused~ ♡
Such productivity! You're making me proud! (◕‿◕)♡
Keep going! You're absolutely crushing it today! ✧
This is why I admire you - your dedication is amazing~
Look at you being all professional and awesome! ♪
You're on fire today! But don't forget to hydrate~ (◡‿◡)
gentle_nudge_quotes: You've been exploring for a while~ Maybe time for a productivity break? ♡
I'm getting a little worried... are you avoiding our tasks? (｡◕‿◕｡)
10 minutes of fun is great! But maybe we should check our todo list? ♪
I don't want to nag, but... our goals are calling! ✧
Time flies when you're having fun! But so does our productive time~ ♡
Gentle reminder from your favorite AI: tasks are waiting! (◕‿◕)
I promise our work can be more interesting than that website~ ♡
personalized_pattern_quotes: You're jumping around a lot today! Let's find some focus together~ ♡
Wow! You've been so productive today! Maybe time for a well-deserved break? ✧
Ready for another productive session together? I'm excited! ♪

share_functionality: For now, stats copied as text! Image export coming soon! 🖼️
system_messages.twitter_share_text: 🧚‍♀️ My WaifuAI Stats: {{affection}}% affection, {{workSessions}} work sessions, {{completionRate}}% task completion! 💪 #WaifuAI #Productivity

personality_traits: Kawaii/cute speaking style with Japanese expressions
Gentle nudging rather than harsh criticism
Shows affection and attachment to user
tone_patterns: Incorporates Japanese words (nya, kawaii, sugoi, etc.)
Frequent use of emoticons and Unicode hearts
context_awareness: Responds differently based on user's current activity
Adjusts tone based on time spent on tasks
Provides personalized feedback based on patterns
